description.narrative: This activity (Financial Sector Stability Project) is a component of Accelerating Investment and Infrastructure in Nepal reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,056,625. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Financial policy and administrative management, Monetary institutions. , with the following implementing partners: PwC India. The start date is 10-05-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
